pre_text_caption_evidence: in march 2011 , we announced a new program under which the purchase by us of up to $ 675 million of our common stock in 2011 was authorized by our board of directors .
during 2011 , we purchased approximately 16.3 million shares of our common stock under this program , and as of december 31 , 2011 , no purchase authority remained under the program .
the following table presents purchases of our common stock and related information for the three months ended december 31 , 2011 .

( dollars in millions , except per share amounts , shares in thousands ) period total number of shares purchased under publicly announced program average price paid per share approximate dollar value of shares purchased under publicly announced program approximate dollar value of shares yet to be purchased under publicly announced program .
